mapper.select: SELECT po.*, u.real_name as creator_name, s.supplier_name, r.requirement_code FROM purchase_order po LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON po.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN supplier s ON po.supplier_id = s.id LEFT JOIN requirement r ON po.requirement_id = r.id WHERE po.id = #{id}

SELECT po.*, u.real_name as creator_name, s.supplier_name, r.requirement_code FROM purchase_order po LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON po.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN supplier s ON po.supplier_id = s.id LEFT JOIN requirement r ON po.requirement_id = r.id WHERE po.requirement_id = #{requirementId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_order (order_code, requirement_id, supplier_id, total_amount, order_date, delivery_date, status, creator_id, remark, create_time) VALUES (#{orderCode}, #{requirementId}, #{supplierId}, #{totalAmount}, #{orderDate}, #{deliveryDate}, #{status}, #{creatorId}, #{remark}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase_order SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
